languages.text: "Мы ловим душу света в солнечном ветре. Ищем следы Омниссии, прошедшего по пустыне".
"We catch the soul of the light in the solar wind. We look for the footsteps the Omnissiah left when He walked the desert."
languages.original_text: "Мы ловим душу света в солнечном ветре. Ищем следы Омниссии, прошедшего по пустыне".

traits.locale_text: "We catch the soul of the light in the solar wind. We look for the footsteps the Omnissiah left when He walked the desert."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

traits.locale_text: "We catch the soul of the light in the solar wind. We look for the footsteps the Omnissiah left when He walked the desert."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: 「我々は太陽風の中で、光の魂を捕まえました。我々は万機神が砂漠を歩かれた時に残された足跡を探しています」
languages.original_text: "We catch the soul of the light in the solar wind. We look for the footsteps the Omnissiah left when He walked the desert."

traits.locale_text: 「我々は太陽風の中で、光の魂を捕まえました。我々は万機神が砂漠を歩かれた時に残された足跡を探しています」
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: “我们在恒星的风暴中捕捉光的灵魂，我们寻找欧姆尼塞亚走过沙漠时留下的足迹。”
languages.original_text: "We catch the soul of the light in the solar wind. We look for the footsteps the Omnissiah left when He walked the desert."

traits.locale_text: “我们在恒星的风暴中捕捉光的灵魂，我们寻找欧姆尼塞亚走过沙漠时留下的足迹。”
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: "Wir fangen die Seele des Lichts im Sonnenwind. Wir suchen nach Fußspuren des Omnissiah, als Er durch die Wüste wandelte."
languages.original_text: "We catch the soul of the light in the solar wind. We look for the footsteps the Omnissiah left when He walked the desert."

traits.locale_text: "Wir fangen die Seele des Lichts im Sonnenwind. Wir suchen nach Fußspuren des Omnissiah, als Er durch die Wüste wandelte."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: « Nous capturons l'âme de la lumière dans le vent solaire. Nous cherchons les traces laissées par l'Omnimessie lors de Sa traversée du désert. »
languages.original_text: "We catch the soul of the light in the solar wind. We look for the footsteps the Omnissiah left when He walked the desert."

traits.locale_text: « Nous capturons l'âme de la lumière dans le vent solaire. Nous cherchons les traces laissées par l'Omnimessie lors de Sa traversée du désert. »
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: «Atrapamos el alma de la luz en el viento solar. Buscamos las huellas que dejó el Omnissiah cuando caminó por el desierto».
languages.original_text: "We catch the soul of the light in the solar wind. We look for the footsteps the Omnissiah left when He walked the desert."

traits.locale_text: «Atrapamos el alma de la luz en el viento solar. Buscamos las huellas que dejó el Omnissiah cuando caminó por el desierto».
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: "Güneş rüzgârlarındaki ışığın ruhunu yakalıyoruz. Hermesih'in çöllerde yürüdüğü zamanlardan kalma ayak izlerini arıyoruz."
languages.original_text: "We catch the soul of the light in the solar wind. We look for the footsteps the Omnissiah left when He walked the desert."

traits.locale_text: "Güneş rüzgârlarındaki ışığın ruhunu yakalıyoruz. Hermesih'in çöllerde yürüdüğü zamanlardan kalma ayak izlerini arıyoruz."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved
